column5: this could be the first hard water report of the season for OFC?  1.15 kms as the crow flies, from my truck to the lake, I can't fly so I'm guessing I hiked double that distance, around bogs, hills and thick bush,     I broke a sweat hiking, not good on a cold, windy day, I was happy to find 4 to 6 inches of good ice, here's a Trout Junkie tip up waiting for a bite     It was quiet for the first hour, then the bite turned on, 4 to 8 feet of water was where the action was      I tried to use the timer on my camera to photo some of the bigger specimens     there was some good battles bringing in these feisty brookies on a hand line      A nice afternoon, worth the effort
Beauts!!!!  Second report ive seen but whos counting? Im still very envious lol. Looks like an awesome time was had! Good on ya!!! Thanks for sharing
Well,lets just say yer not the first,BUT,you caught a fish,which in my books,your #1  Nice report.
Well,lets just say yer not the first,BUT,you caught a fish,which in my books,your #1  Nice report. I was going to say second report but first one that fish were actually caught.
NICE!  I have never fished for them but I'm sure they would be a blast; with a reel or by hand line to bring them up.
Beauty brookies wish i went out today. Was that on the new lake you were telling me about? Cheers jeff
Oh man. Beauty fish. Well done.
Real nice brookies!!!! I'm jealous!!! Hopefully some of the lake closer to the GTA will be good to go soon!
Right on Chris!!!  Gotta feel great to beat the snowy bush, travel light and find some treasure.
Awesome.
Great looking fish for your effort!!!!!!  .
Well done Chris !!!! Some nice back lake brookies man !!!!
Those are some real chunky specks...up here we got all the snow but we're lacking in the ice
Great stuff Chris, really nice fish….one species i've attempted to catch many times….i said attempted because i failed every attempt!  Very jealous!

Beauts!!!! Second report ive seen but whos counting? Im still very envious lol. Looks like an awesome time was had! Good on ya!!! Thanks for sharing   Dood…we better get our act together and start 'reprezentin'
Beauty brookies, awesome lookin' male. I'm eagerly awaiting for 1st ice brookies around these parts...

Beauty brookies wish i went out today. Was that on the new lake you were telling me about? Cheers jeff  yes, that's where I was, I guess you guys didn't make it out  Right on Chris!!!  Gotta feel great to beat the snowy bush, travel light and find some treasure.  thanks Moosebunk, it was fun to see the tip-ups bouncing again  Well done Chris !!!! Some nice back lake brookies man !!!!  thanks Shawn, if you ever want to take a break from sleddin', we should do some ice fishing  Those are some real chunky specks...up here we got all the snow but we're lacking in the ice  I remember reading you were thinking of going out this weekend, I guess the conditions messed that up    Dood…we better get our act together and start 'reprezentin'  If I lived up where you guys do, I wouldn't bother with the brookies when you've got walleye like you guys have
Hey Chris, I think I seen that tip up move in the first picture. Go for it!!!
Hopefully a sign of things to come for you this season, gorgeous fish, congrats.
Awsome Chris!Glad you got in to come fish!  This post is going to make it tough to get through the next few weeks!
First ice specks, very nice!
Beauty first ice specks!! Well done!  S.
